    • setHeader

      public void setHeader(net.sf.json.JSONObject billingEntry)
      Set the header data for this group of billings. Header consists of a providers, service location, and service date and is the header for a group of individual patients with the header data in commons.

    • addBill

      public boolean addBill(LoggedInInfo loggedInInfo, net.sf.json.JSONObject billingEntry)
      Create a new billing object to be stored into an array for later processing. Lots of data here is hard coded.
